fields.headline: Best family breaks
fields.bodyText: France PGL Travel (08700 507507, pgl.co.uk) has a four-night New Year break to Chateau de Grande Romaine near Paris from £195 per adult (£175 for children), including full-board, all activities and a one-day pass to Disneyland Paris. Wales A night's B&B at The Future Inn (029-2048 7111, futureinns.co.uk) in Cardiff Bay with tickets to see The Wizard Of Oz at the Wales Millennium Centre costs from £145 for a family of four. Devon Until December 16, Helpful Holidays (01647 434063) has a week's self-catering for up to six at Old Castle Lurke, a gothic rectory on the edge of Ringmore, for £236 (saving 20%). London Between November 25 and December 17, Leisure Direction (0870 4428930, leisuredirection.co.uk) has one night's B&B at a four-star hotel in Bloomsbury or South Kensington, with an hour's skating at Somerset House, at a cost of £187 for a family of four. Morocco Departing December 21, Walks Worldwide (01524 242000, walksworldwide.com) has a 10-day Sahara Dune trek for £895pp (children 5-11 £750), with visits to M'Hamid and Chegaga. Price includes flights, hotels and desert camps, most meals and camel tours. Malta Departing December 10, Malta Direct (020-8561 9079, maltadirect.com) has a week's B&B at the four-star Dolmen Hotel in Buggiba for £920.90 per family of four, including Gatwick flights and transfers.
